page.title: 05Theresa and Jenny
page.content: Theresa and Jenny are just two girls among many adults and children,that keep and own horses for a pastime. Jenny's horse is called Pooh bear,Theresa's horse is called Hercules. Both horses are twelve years of age. Theresa has had her horse for two years and seven months and Jenny has had hers for one year and six months. Pooh bear is a New Forest cross welsh and Hercules is a welsh cross Shetland. Pooh is a bay colour and Hercules is a grey colour. They have ten to twelve acres to run about in. There are stables across the road if they are needed. The mixture in their feed is pony nuts,hay,sugar beat and bran. The feeding arrangements are that they are fed once a day in the winter and in the summer they also
